eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Navajo, AZ; at 03:18 PM ON JAN 6, 2026 Effective until 01:18 AM JAN 7, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Navajo Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Navajo Police Department is looking for and American Indian male. Aaron Mark Bradley, 67 years-old, 5 foot 7 inches, 140 lbs., with gray hair and black eyes. Aaron was last seen wearing a black shirt, wrangler jeans and white tennis shoes. Aaron was last seen on foot at the Shonto Market in Shonto, Arizona, Navajo County on Saturday, September 6, 2025. He has a feather tattoo with the names Kim, Kayla and Karen on his left arm. He has an angel tattoo with the name Kelly on his chest. Aaron has a scar on his left arm. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
